explains: adj. 无限期的，期限不定的；模糊不清的，不明确的；（词，屈折变化，短语）不定的

sentences.en: The trial was adjourned for an indefinite period.
They seem determined to string the talks out for an indefinite period.
sentences.cn: 他们好像一心要把谈判无限期地拖下去。

sentences.en: My heart was filled with puzzlement about the indefinite future and longing for the new life.
sentences.cn: 我的心对不确定的未来充满了困惑，渴望着新生活。
